ProjectTitle: Defeating ‘Subversion’: Anti-Communism and Public Order Policing in France and Italy, 1930-1953
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/01/2025
Please reconsider the storage solutions of your research data. KU Leuven currently funds your research. The understanding is then that all research data you generate during your research here pertain to KU Leuven. It is therefore advisable to use KU Leuven storage, at least for the new data that you generate. These data will also need to remain preserved on KU Leuven storage for 10 years. So even if you continue to use your private dropbox for your source data, you can make backups of your generated data on KU Leuven servers (see https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en for options), and then deposit final datasets in KU Leuven RDR.
label: good with suggestions
